Articles.Content: I am curious. I have had KSP on steam since version .21 came out. each and every update it updates. until now. I have: Keep KSP Up To Date checked and both my steam launcher and desktop shortcuts launched 1.1.3. what in the actual what is going on.
update: removed ksp from its steam folder, and down loaded again. it will NOT load beyond 50%. it keeps flashing "loading hints" or w/e you want to call them, but, its frozen at 50%.
Click the "x of y downloads completed" on the bottom of the screen to bring up the download manager, and make sure there isn't something else holding it up.

12 minutes ago, pincushionman said:

Click the "x of y downloads completed" on the bottom of the screen to bring up the download manager, and make sure there isn't something else holding it up.

all files were complete, so, ran a verify, and 1300+ files were borked some how. steam fixed. it runs! you sir pointed me in the right way, thank you!
Question now: why did it fail to auto update...
Probably the same reason. Or maybe it DID try to update, screwed it up, and that was your result.
@Camaron Could be
